mapper.insert: INSERT into asset_articles_use (id, title, odd_number, state, process_instance_id, remark, enclosure_info, create_id, create_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{oddNumber}, #{state}, #{processInstanceId}, #{remark}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{createId}, #{createTime})

insert into asset_articles_use_goods (id, use_id, type_id, article_id, article_name, apply_use_num, remark, state) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.useId}, #{item.typeId}, #{item.articleId}, #{item.articlesName}, #{item.applyUseNum}, #{item.remark}, #{item.state})
mapper.select: SELECT a.article_name articleName, CONCAT(c.specifications, '(', c.unit_of_measurement, ')') specificationsName, b.type_name typeName, a.apply_use_num applyUseNum, a.actual_use_num actualUseNum, a.remark, a.state, CASE a.state WHEN '0' THEN '未提交审批' WHEN '1' THEN '等待发放' WHEN '2' THEN '库存不足' WHEN '3' THEN '库存充足' WHEN '4' THEN '拒绝发放' END stateName FROM asset_articles_use_goods a LEFT JOIN asset_articles_type b ON a.type_id = b.id LEFT JOIN asset_articles c ON a.article_id = c.id WHERE a.use_id = #{useId}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.odd_number oddNumver, a.remark, a.state, b.user_name userName, IFNULL(a.enclosure_info, '') enclosureInfo FROM asset_articles_use a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.article_id articleId, CONCAT(c.specifications, '(', c.unit_of_measurement, ')') specificationsName, a.type_id typeId, a.apply_use_num applyUseNum, c.residual_num residualNum, a.remark FROM asset_articles_use_goods a LEFT JOIN asset_articles c ON a.article_id = c.id WHERE a.use_id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.state FROM asset_articles_use a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.odd_number oddNumber, a.remark, a.state, IFNULL(a.enclosure_info, '') enclosureInfo, IFNULL(a.process_instance_id,'') processInstanceId, b.user_name userName FROM asset_articles_use a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id FROM asset_articles_use a WHERE a.process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId} AND a.state = '1'
SELECT a.id, a.article_id articleId, a.apply_use_num applyUseNum, b.residual_num residualNum FROM asset_articles_use_goods a LEFT JOIN asset_articles b ON a.article_id = b.id WHERE a.use_id = #{id}
SELECT a.id FROM asset_articles_use a WHERE a.process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId}
